title: Windows10
body:
My question is : Will League Of Legends work on Windows 10 and if it will not, what should I do to fix it?
Thank you for help

replies.body:
Yes, League works great on Windows 10. Recently, though, there was a batch of Anniversary updates that went out that are causing issues for some players. If this is happening to you, I recommend [uninstalling or rolling back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) to a previous build of Windows to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I got W10 and It works except recently this shows up https://scr.hu/gO6lV0 ;/
Ok, but I saw a lot of ways to fix it, I hope some of them will work :)
